sentences.sContent: Don’t worry about all the details as long as you get the gist (= understand the main meaning ) of it.
sentences.sCn: 不要去管各个细节，只要理解主要意思就行了。

remMethod.val: 和list(v. 列出)一起记： list(列出)the gists(要点)

trans.tranCn: 要点, 要旨, 依据, [法律]诉讼主因
trans.tranOther: the main idea and meaning of what someone has said or written
